FAIL_TO_PASS: when may be duplicate identical candidates then only return one
when showHelpAfterError() and error and then shows full help
when cli of cat and commands ["at"] then suggest at because 1 deletion
when missing option-argument then shows help
when not enough width then no wrap
when unknown command and showSuggestionAfterError() then show suggestion
when enough width then wrap
when custom write() then version on custom output
when cli of cart and commands ["camb","cant","bard"] then suggest cant because only closest of different edit distances
when specify just custom short flag then display version
when missing command-argument then shows help
when default writeErr then help error on stderr
when global option then candidate for subcommand option suggestion
when global and local options then both candidates
when cli of --at and options ["--cat"] then suggest --cat because 1 insertion
when configureOutput after copyInheritedSettings then original unchanged
when getOutHasColors returns true then help has color
when custom getErrHelpWidth then help error helpWidth custom
when custom write() then help error on custom output
when custom outputErr and error then outputErr called
